question:
You recently Stayed at your friends Place to look after the house while he/she is away. You accidentally damaged something in his/her house.write a letter to your friendIn your letter You Should :
•	Describe what the accident was
•	explain when it happened
•	Suggest how the damage can be fixed
text: I hope you are fit and fine. I beg your pardon to disturb you in between your trip as I feel it is essential to tell you that I inadvertently broke the door of your store.

There was a huge storm last Monday and it caused a fault in the electricity supply of your house. After reading your instruction book that you handed over to me before leaving for the trip, I tried to open the door of the store on the first floor for a tool kit. However, the door got stuck and when I pulled with a little force, it fell upon me.

To be honest, I accidentally damaged the door otherwise I had no intention to break anything. Nonetheless, to mend my mistake, I have talked to a carpenter  and he has given an estimate of $40 to replace the hinges. If you allow then I can call him and can get the damage fixed before you come back.
I hope to see you soon.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the pronoun your may not fit this context. Consider replacing it with an article.
